title: CVE-2021-3326 (communications_cloud_native_core_security_edge_protection_proxy, debian_linux, e-series_santricity_os_controller, glibc, m10-1_firmware, m10-4_firmware, m10-4s_firmware, m12-1_firmware, m12-2_firmware, m12-2s_firmware, ontap_select_deploy_administration_utility)
description: The iconv function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) 2.32 and earlier, when processing invalid input sequences in the ISO-2022-JP-3 encoding, fails an assertion in the code path and aborts the program, potentially resulting in a denial of service.
